arts.ttl: Change up front: Hull City team news and predicted XI to face Sunderland in latest pre-season test
arts.sum: HCAFC - Hull City have two more friendlies to get through before the start of the new Championship season away at Coventry City. The post Change up front: Hull City team news and predicted XI to face Sunderland in latest pre-season test appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
